website_summaries.verdict: If you frequently rely on precise measurement indicators, it's best to look elsewhere for a product that actually provides measurements.
pros: Generates enthusiasm among those who want a fully equipped bar set, as it comes with pieces such as a strainer and double jigger
cons: Measuring jigger lacks any sort of measurement indication, leaving users to figure out measurements themselves

customer_reviews.title: Good starter kit.
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for something professional, keep looking. But this is a good basic set that will meet your needs if you're a casual home bartender on a budget. The materials seem fairly sturdy, and my only real complaint is that the "measuring" jigger doesn't have the measures labeled on it. The shaker is on the small side but enough for about two martinis at a time, and I've never had problems with leaking as another reviewer suggested. You really can't beat the price, and I'll probably opt for a nicer set the next time I get one, but I have a feeling I'll be happy with this one for quite a while.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: I was originally looking for all the basic parts of a bartending kit separately, but then I found this kit so I figured I’d give it a try. I’m new to this whole scene but ever since I received this set and used it for mojitos when I had some friends over I have been so excited to use it again next weekend! The only reason I took one star off is because the cap for the shaker gets a little difficult to take off once the contents have chilled inside due to the ice, but otherwise it’s great for someone looking to get into bartending at home like me!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Fancy enough for me!
customer_reviews.text: It's great! I love getting back at my loud neighbor when shaking up a cocktail :] . I use the stirrer when I am too lazy to shake up a drink, works fine. The shaker really, really (extensive vocabulary, I know) gets your drinks really ( ;] ) cold after a few shakes. Cold enough that the two sections of the shaker fuse together for a short while, so don't panic. I feel fancy when using this set. It's not made of platinum or gold but, it gets the job done and looks good doing so.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Items came in a see through box which was great for when gift was unwrapped
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as a Christmas present. I received much sooner than I thought. Items came in a see through box which was great for when gift was unwrapped. The quality is good it does its purpose. I assume that if you are a professional bar tender or mixer expert you might want something a little bigger or with more accessories. I really liked the set and might even order one for myself. The price was not bad at all.
customer_reviews.author: HHernandez

customer_reviews.title: I love this little shaker!
customer_reviews.text: My husband doesn't drink, so I was looking for something small to handle a single cosmo or a mixer and was hoping this would do the trick. Its perfect! I didn't need the extra bits that it came with, but at the price, it was so very worth it. All the pieces fit snugly together with no drip and it pours beautifully into the martini glass with no leaking. A great purchase! It even handles a double quite well for when the friends come over!
customer_reviews.author: Misty Kuprevich

customer_reviews.title: so it is great for those just starting to get in the hobby ...
customer_reviews.text: This set will definitely get the job done, so it is great for those just starting to get in the hobby of making cocktails. However, the quality is rather poor. I could easily bend anything in this set since the metal is so thin. So far they have actually held up pretty well, and we have been using them quite often for the past few months.
customer_reviews.author: CMaharrey

customer_reviews.title: Nice little set
customer_reviews.text: Nice little set! Great to show off your drink mixing skills to friends. The shot measurer seems like two smaller cups fused together, so I'm watching that hoping it won't come apart... It also had a couple of minor burrs in the bottom, but I've scrubbed so they're benign but a little annoying. I can recommend with 4/5 confidence
customer_reviews.author: Ben Dover

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, but still going.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my GF and I to be able to explore the mixed-drink world and have some fun doing it. While inexpensive and somewhat flimsy, this set is still going strong. In the months of ownership, the shaker, strainer, and lid are totally stain and rust free. We don't use the other stuff much, but the other items are still whole. The mixing spoon and jigger are constructed with tiny welds, and I don't expect them to last forever, but even considering that I count this purchase as a success.
customer_reviews.author: TheDudeAbides

customer_reviews.title: It gets the job done, ok for casual ppl
customer_reviews.text: Gets the job done so it’s ok. It gets stuck a few times. Also built in strainer broke after one use. Have been trying to fix it but no luck. Would only get it if you are on a budget and not super crafty, just a casual drinker. If you are a daily drinker or enthusiast then would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: ads

customer_reviews.title: Nice Starter Set
customer_reviews.text: Not bad for the for the cost. It is not made very sturdy, the metal is thin with sharp edges, not rounded. The round part of the spook came off in my hand when I picked it up. A little gorilla glue and it was fine. The metal is smooth with a nice shine, at a glance it looks like it may be a more expensive set. Nice starter set.
customer_reviews.author: Special

customer_reviews.title: I always enjoy finding exactly what I need all at once and ...
customer_reviews.text: I always enjoy finding exactly what I need all at once and this set is no exception! Everything you need to make your obsession of choice with quick and easy clean up! This is a great add to your bar at home or just keep in the box it comes in for very good cupboard storage. Either way you will not be disappointed in this buy!
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Makes me look like a Pro while I make terrible drinks!
customer_reviews.text: Great little Martini set. Box was nicely packaged too. Didn't make me a better drink maker, but the set makes me look professional! They seem like quality products, and I can't see me having and issues for years with them. Haven't run them through the dish washer yet, but I can't imagine having any problems with it. Two thumbs up
customer_reviews.author: qrpike

customer_reviews.title: Great gift product!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item as a gift for a family member and he loved it and it was exactly what he was looking for. The only reason that I did not give it five stars is because the packaging looked kind of cheap and did not really have any type of namebrand anywhere on the box which I thought was kind of strange. But it was exactly as described and my loved one was very happy with the gift.
customer_reviews.author: queenofthehill15

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: I love this it made me feel like a real bartender. I love making drinks more now.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would make a good gift
customer_reviews.text: I would say this is a little smaller than I expected, but it's nice for the price and comes in nice packaging that would make for a good gift.
customer_reviews.author: Katiekins

customer_reviews.title: Frequency of Use will define if you should buy this
customer_reviews.text: It works well for the first few uses, and then the strainer comes loose. It is very pretty, and works like a champ; but it is for someone who makes cocktails for the occasional party; but not someone who likes a martini or mixed drink a few times a week.
customer_reviews.author: mrjeremiahross

customer_reviews.title: Super cheap quality - didn't even want to spend the ...
customer_reviews.text: Super cheap quality - didn't even want to spend the funds to return it - gave it to goodwill. The spoon was just glued to the metal stem. A child could bend these they were so thin ... don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: RevDesigns

customer_reviews.title: Great starter set
customer_reviews.text: Great starter set. I love to make bloody Mary's when I am camping and this worked like a charm! Really seals nice and brings the drink to a perfect chill. I purchased another one for a gift. Nice price for a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, it also has a cap on the shaker which is not shown in the picture, it comes off and you can then pour the mixed drink through the grated holes bypassing the actual strainer it comes with. Very happy w my purchase!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle William

customer_reviews.title: This will rust.  Not stainless steel as stainless steel does not rust!
customer_reviews.text: Used this twice now and it is starting to rust. Rinsed it out and put it in the dishwasher and then pulled it to find rust on the edges. Low quality POS. Not real stainless steel as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Quality product. I had to order another bar set due to several moves and several "lost" possessions. It seems to be made of quality material and works just fine. I would recommend this product because it has a great price and it's just as good as a more expensive set.
customer_reviews.author: Marilee0123

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Nice
customer_reviews.text: Great entry level cocktail set. Can tell the metal is cheap but I did not buy this for professional use. Would still buy again.
customer_reviews.author: DTM

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a friend for Christmas and he was thrilled with all the kit contained it was a hit this Christmas for someone who had almost everything. Nice quality and value. I recommend it to anyone needing drink mixer.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra S.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Awesome set! I was skeptical to order after reading some reviews, but my husband loves it and it has not had any problems. I've washed all of it in the dishwasher and it has worked great! No leaking during shaking either!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Duncan

customer_reviews.title: The price is perfect. Better and less expensive than other similar products ...
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I wanted and just the right for mixing a single cocktail. The price is perfect. Better and less expensive than other similar products I reviewed before buying.
customer_reviews.author: Janetw

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and it can be rusted easily.
customer_reviews.text: You got what you paid for. Metal doesn't have a coding so basically you can taste the metal if you mix your drink with it. It looks like it can be rusted easily as well.
customer_reviews.author: One2Dad

customer_reviews.title: Passable
customer_reviews.text: Ive used it several times to nake martinis. Not bad for the price. What would drive OCD people crazy is the lid doesnt seem to always go on straight. Regardless, it gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Crafty Sue

customer_reviews.title: happy
customer_reviews.text: I am happy to say that this item made my day. My boyfriend loved it as a gift and was able to put it to use right away. It came in a wonderful gift set box and I love how shiny the items are. Definitely worth the price and I wouldn't buying more for other friends.
customer_reviews.author: johnson

customer_reviews.title: Modern and functional
customer_reviews.text: There may be fancier sets out there but this one - which does come in a nice gift set box, is stainless steel, dishwasher safe, and has a modern, functional, sleek look to it. Everything you need is here!
customer_reviews.author: Amazonic

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Useful
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for making Pisco Sours! I would, perhaps, like the shaker to be a bit larger. Easy to clean, perfect for our cocktail needs.
customer_reviews.author: Richard K

customer_reviews.title: I love it...
customer_reviews.text: A nice little set for the price. The rop secures tightly to keep liquid in while shaking, and it also is not difficult to remove to pour.
customer_reviews.author: Myles B Dyson

customer_reviews.title: ... something to keep at home for the price is good
customer_reviews.text: loving it I do my cocktail with this is simple but it works something to keep at home for the price is good
customer_reviews.author: el papi

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving this as a gift in December so I won't know about how the actual ptoduct works until them but delivery was on time and the product looked good and in tact. The case it comes in does not look expensive by any means but okay for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Abby Weise

customer_reviews.title: perfect set for a budget
customer_reviews.text: Great set: inexpensive and has all of the needed pieces. I bought one set for my husband, who loved it, so after a year I bought it for my brother too.
customer_reviews.author: DevotedMomWifeNurse

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: This set is nice for the price. All pieces came with the set and it was packaged nicely. I gifted this to my friend for Christmas and she really loves it and uses it all the time! (It definitely works!)
customer_reviews.author: Helen Phillips • Style Inherited

customer_reviews.title: The spoon's shaft acts as a straw which is cool for drink QA if you're playing
customer_reviews.text: Everything feels a little chintzy, though I suppose that's to be expected given the price. The spoon's shaft acts as a straw which is cool for drink QA if you're playing bartender
customer_reviews.author: joshdcomp

customer_reviews.title: BEST BUY
customer_reviews.text: Most Best Buy, the set is exactly or even better than description.
customer_reviews.author: Diana P

customer_reviews.title: I just prefer plastic
customer_reviews.text: I like everything that comes in this set and if you like using stainless steel this is a great cocktail set. However I just prefer my plastic one. Seems like it cleans up easier and faster.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: and the product is light and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Shipped right on time, and the product is light and easy to use! My kamikaze drinks were on point for Halloween! I definitely recommend this for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: miriamization

customer_reviews.title: Bought for a Gift, Liked it so much I bought another for myself..
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift along with a cocktail recipe book and it was a hit! I liked it so much I bought another for myself...
customer_reviews.author: April P.

customer_reviews.title: Im happy with this item!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice set!! Not the fanciest set out there but its still really nice for house parties! Good quality too! The price is also a great bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner set
customer_reviews.text: Great beginner set. Used many times and there is no rust spots what so ever. Used at parties and mixed many drinks. the size of the jigger is ok. Would highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: smallbusiness2009

customer_reviews.title: Will buy it again.
customer_reviews.text: Our house loved this. Easy to use and hasn't rusted add yet. Will buy one for the kiddos when they move out!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Dimaruo

customer_reviews.title: Home bartender tool
customer_reviews.text: It does what it's supposed to do. However, I don't use it for martinis - I like mine stirred - but it's great for Manhattans and any other drink that needs shaking.
customer_reviews.author: Judith A. Carlson

customer_reviews.title: just as expected...
customer_reviews.text: totally met expectations, packaging was great as well...use it daily for my martinis...perfect size...don't use the jigger, however...happy to have this
customer_reviews.author: Ed O'Herron

customer_reviews.title: Shake it up!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this. Great set at a great price. Has a limited lifetime warranty. Seems pretty sturdy so far. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought it as a little gift for my husband to start making his drinks... He's enjoying it.. I did research a lot of products on amazon before deciding on this.. Came in a nice box and it includes the basic tools.
customer_reviews.author: ManishaW

customer_reviews.title: Great set for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great little shaker, works well for margaritas and such. Jigger is 1/2 ounce and 1 ounce -- wish it had 1/4 ounce marking in the 1/2 ounce end, but it's still perfectly usable. I'm pleased.
customer_reviews.author: DeAnna Burghart

customer_reviews.title: really nice set, good price
customer_reviews.text: really nice set, good price. items feel sturdy and well made. everything went through the dishwasher without a problem, I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: Reality Bytes

customer_reviews.title: The metal was a little thin but it still works ...
customer_reviews.text: The metal was a little thin but it still works well. Next time we will shoot for a higher quality product
customer_reviews.author: evelyn gellenbeck

customer_reviews.title: it makes a mean martini that tastes great at the camp site
customer_reviews.text: What can one say about a martini shaker? Ahhhh... it makes a mean martini that tastes great at the camp site.
customer_reviews.author: Bill from AZ

customer_reviews.title: Christmas Gift
customer_reviews.text: I got this and was very pleased! I bought it for my best friend for christmas and for good price you get everything you need. I would recommend this cocktail set to anyone looking to buy. You will be happy with your buy.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice set!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. All pieces are larger than the cheesy midsize sets. These more closely resemble what you would see in a bar.
customer_reviews.author: JGasPhotodotcom

customer_reviews.title: As described. Solid shaker.
customer_reviews.text: We use the shaker all the time. It's good quality and easy to clean. As described.
customer_reviews.author: rockinshoe

customer_reviews.title: Well done.
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Nothing fancy and combined with the lifetime warranty can't be beat. First cocktails came out DELICIOUS and would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: A. Fetterman

customer_reviews.title: but it is fantastic. The shaker gets super cold to make it ...
customer_reviews.text: I mainly only use the shaker, strainer and measuring shots, but it is fantastic. The shaker gets super cold to make it smooth and very well blended.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Layman

customer_reviews.title: Great addition...
customer_reviews.text: To the Starter Alcoholics kitchen ;-) I've just started getting into a variety of mixed drinks and this shaker set as been quintessential in making my drinks perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Isaiah Warren

customer_reviews.title: Kind of cheap.
customer_reviews.text: Took a long time to receive it and the metal strainer and ice tongs are cheap metal that bend very easily.
customer_reviews.author: Susan J. Olson

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good except for the spoon
customer_reviews.text: This set is quite nice, especially considering how cheap it is. The spoon it comes with, however, is pretty bad. The head of the spoon is just attached to one side of the handle rather than smoothly merging into it, so it makes it really difficult to float drinks with, and it also snapped off the first night I used it. The only other problem is that the set doesn't include any kind of case for transporting it.
customer_reviews.author: Evan Jeffrey

customer_reviews.title: Really really cheaply made; you get what you pay for here
customer_reviews.text: The metal is about as thin as a beer can. Really crappy design, but that is expected for the price.
customer_reviews.author: lobi

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: It's a beginner kit. Nice item. Well built. Easy to use. My bar tender friend likes it. If it can come with some sort of receipt would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: LD

customer_reviews.title: Gets the Job Done
customer_reviews.text: It's OK, but I should have spent more on a higher quality set. Feels somewhat cheap but gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Kirkpatrick

customer_reviews.title: the small cap got stuck on the shaker and the ...
customer_reviews.text: the small cap got stuck on the shaker and the strainer built into the cap is fell off, so had to rely on the extra strainer.
customer_reviews.author: Naveen Gupta

customer_reviews.title: Great starter kit
customer_reviews.text: This is a good starter set, I'm glad to have it. But will upgrade to better quality eventually.
customer_reviews.author: Yrose

customer_reviews.title: Not the greatest
customer_reviews.text: After reading all the great reviews I was hoping this would be great buy. Everything seemed fine until I made a drink. The top half gets stuck so bad that I have to use a knife to pry it off. And no I didn't leave it sitting for hours. I immediatley tried to take it off and it seems like you'd need the jaws of life to remove it. Pretty rediculous if you ask me. Oh well. You get what you pay for. Also, it is smaller than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: A. Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Basic
customer_reviews.text: A basic set that meets our needs. If I had to do it over again, I would have ordered a set that is sturdier but this works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Yep!
customer_reviews.text: Tired of struggling with sub-par home cocktails? This set will step your mixing game up.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Parts that come with the shaker are really Cheepo junk... I tossed all but the strainer.
customer_reviews.author: flc

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Lovetttt is so easy to use And clean ...for the price I can't ask for none.....
customer_reviews.author: lucy

customer_reviews.title: Good cocktail shaker.
customer_reviews.text: I like my 5 piece cocktail shaker. It was smaller than I expected but still makes a good drink.
customer_reviews.author: Jeane

customer_reviews.title: Great value and multiple uses
customer_reviews.text: Makes shaker drinks super easy. The container is durable, and I love the pour spout at the top. In a pinch, it's a perfect doughnut cutter.
customer_reviews.author: Janet B

customer_reviews.title: Bargain!
customer_reviews.text: These are being used as props for a play I am directing, and I found them most useful, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Janet E. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Very inexpensive cocktail set that does the trick. It comes with all the needed pieces and I'm very happy with the purchase!

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: helped mix a mommy drink and did it well, lol

customer_reviews.title: perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: perfect for that someone who loves to make mixed drinks but doenst have all stuff for it came very nicely packaged as well
customer_reviews.author: tealady

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Functions well as a mixing set for regular household use.
customer_reviews.author: Kuma

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Cool
customer_reviews.text: I only really use the shaker, but it does the job. I was looking for strainers, and this came up, for only a few dollars more I got 5 pieces as opposed to one. I'm not a fan of how unfinished the spoon looks, I feel like I could easily cut myself on the end of it. But other than that it works if you need it to.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Shaffer

customer_reviews.title: Cold!
customer_reviews.text: This set is pretty neat for the home bar, but it gets FREEZING after a few shakes and gives you frost burn, LOL!
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Nice set and good products for good price. Thank You.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: its cheap, and feels cheap too. so you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: M. Bowen

customer_reviews.title: They work
customer_reviews.text: These are not fancy, but work very well for their purpose. Worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Allison S.Top Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 3 uses
customer_reviews.text: This product is very cheap and the cliche "You get what you pay for" couldn't be more true. Save the hassle and buy a better quality shaker set. Ours broke after three uses...6 drinks!
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: this is a fun little set and it does everything you would expect it to do. good price as well
customer_reviews.author: brandon burke

customer_reviews.title: you get what you pay for but it's great for when your just starting out
customer_reviews.text: Low quality, you get what you pay for but it's great for when your just starting out. If you're careful with it and take care of it it should last. Doesn't leak, and it's a little smaller then what I needed but it was a great price
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: I got this set because it had the bare-essentials I was looking for: A shaker, a strainer and a jigger. Though the other two items will go unused, it was still a great buy. However, the jigger is NOT marked, so you have no idea what the volume capacity is, which I find mildly upsetting. It's nothing impossibly difficult to figure out, but still.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Mejia

customer_reviews.title: Great value. Came in a nice box
customer_reviews.text: Great value. Came in a nice box. Clean, packaged well. Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: Alright for the price but, as some others have ...
customer_reviews.text: Alright for the price but, as some others have said, the set begins to rust after just a few uses.
customer_reviews.author: Oden

customer_reviews.title: But good starter kit if you don't make drinks very often
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap looking and feeling. You have to hold it really tight otherwise, it leaks... Definitely get what you pay for. But good starter kit if you don't make drinks very often.
customer_reviews.author: kenton eatherly

customer_reviews.title: Love this set!
customer_reviews.text: nice starter set! has everything that I need!! Very happy! . . . . . . . . . .
customer_reviews.author: Dylan & Laura

customer_reviews.title: Not a very good value
customer_reviews.text: The jigger and the shaker are nice and good quality but the other pieces seem really cheap
customer_reviews.author: Anna d.

customer_reviews.title: Exelente
customer_reviews.text: is a very good product, looks quality and good design and when you have your hands full the expectations, I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio Martinez C.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: After just four uses, the strainer part broke. I'm a little disappointed and had to purchase a new shaker set.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: they were smart and made the shipping so expensive relative to the ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is cheaply built and it LEAKS when you shake it! The top does not fit in the rest of it correctly. I would return this item, however, they were smart and made the shipping so expensive relative to the price that it would not even be worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent debacco

customer_reviews.title: Very poor soldering
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for with this cheap set. The soldering on this product is very poor; my mixing spoon and jigger have both broken apart when applying light pressure while cleaning. If you're looking to get a mixing set, spend money on quality and buy something that will last.
customer_reviews.author: Vaderfan

customer_reviews.title: Great drinks!
customer_reviews.text: I use this product weekly making mojitos during the summer. Works great but the quality could be better and a little more heavier
customer_reviews.author: Justin Zygarowski

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this thing as I somehow broke my previous cheap one. Started using it one night and I don't remember much after that for some strange reason... but unlike my previous cheap one.. this one was still in good condition when I woke up. I have repeated this experiment several times and it is still around.
customer_reviews.author: AmPeeying

customer_reviews.title: Very good for the price
customer_reviews.text: No problems with this set for someone who will only use it occasionally. I'm sure it will last for my lifetime. The stainless is fairly light, so for someone who does a lot of bartending, it may not take heavy use for too long.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Rodberg

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Great price for the whole set. Though i have not used it yet, all seems to be in top shape and working well.
customer_reviews.author: BBrayford

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product.  Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Only big enough to mix one drink and then only if you use very little ice. Very disappointed in this item.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Mullen

customer_reviews.title: Makes a great present!
customer_reviews.text: bought it to send to my brother, he loves it, (after his glass shaker broke with me watching on Skype)
customer_reviews.author: Rainer Wetjen

product_meta.title: Wyndham House Cocktail Shaker Set for the Home Bar, Stainless Steel, 5-Piece
product_meta.description: The Wyndham House 5-Peice Stainless Steel Bar Set is a must have for anyone who likes to entertain at their home or anyone who enjoys mixing a cocktail for a relaxing evening in. With the right tools mixing your own drinks at home is a breeze. Look and mix like a professional bar tender as you make that Martini, shaken or stirred, your choice. The Wyndham House Stainless Steel Bar Set includes an 18.6-ounce cocktail shaker, stirrer, strainer, double jigger and ice tongs. 5-pieces.
feature_bullets: A MUST HAVE: If you like to entertain guests at your home, then you need this set to mix all the cocktails your company may request. Not to mention all those cocktails you'd like to mix for yourself. A perfect compliment to any home bar.

ALL THE TOOLS YOU NEED: The Wyndham House Stainless Steel Bar Set includes an 18.6-ounce cocktail shaker, stirrer, strainer, double jigger and ice tongs. Everything you need to mix up a Cosmopolitan, Martini or a Tom Collins.

DURABLE STAINLESS STEEL: The durable stainless-steel construction will ensure a lifetime of use from these wonderful bar tools. Stainless steel is corrosion and impact resistant, looks great, easy to clean and offers long term value.

LOOKS SHARP: This set looks sharp on your home bar. The stainless steel looks professional and sure enough, as you entertain you will look like a pro too. Take your entertaining and drink mixing to the next level.
